title: Isolap is clever.
content:
Ok, basically Isolap said he would file a lawsuit to a bunch of kids for cheating in a game. Think about it, him going to court and saying "They were cheating!!!" Honestly, wtf?! The court really wouldn't care.

EDIT: I know that this is like my second topic about Club Penguin, but hes like... Lying to 2 year olds.___________________________________________
[url=http://greenftechn.com/brandon]greenftechn.com/brandon[/url]

title: What?
content: Uh, bp, not to discredit you or anything, but there's a few things wrong with this post. One, you mis-spelled Ilsoap's name. It's hard to sound reputable when you're not going to take the time to spell everything accurately. Two, you don't have any sources linked in your statement. How can you criticize Ilsoap's argument as being "one voice against another," when that is precisely the type of argument you have established here? Three, I'm not sure what you're really trying to get at, with this post. Do you want the Keen community to rally around a cause, either yours or Ilsoap's? Are you trying to make somebody look stupid? Why post this, and then edit in an acknowledgement that it's an unnecessary topic? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: What?
content:
It is indeed unecessary; the cheating in question was harmful to others, there is proof of its occurence and damage was incurred.

So he has every right to bring a lawsuita gainst those who perpetrated these acts and I think its quite smart of him to do so.Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

title: Re: What?
content:
Did you write 'ever' by accident instead of meaning 'never'? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Hmmm, yeah, this topic is rather pointless, I have still no idea (or prove) about what's going on. However, if some kids (20 year old old? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] ) are intentionally damaging the game I can see no harm suing them. However, that may just have been a threat to make them stop, that's all. It'd be not worth one's time suing kids for something, or well, don't know the USA law, perhaps they could be sentenced to death there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: What?
content: And fourthly: as Ilsoap himself pointed out several times, Club Penguin is not his game - he was just an artist working on the project, and AFAIK didn't actually hold any particular position of power, so saying that "Isolap" is filing a lawsuit against these people is very misleading.[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: What?
content:
Once upon a time
On the internet there was a guy
A talented and cool chap
They once called him I-so-lap
Which was a total boner
But nobody knows why.

So b-p came along
Made a thread and misspelled Ilsoap's name
Oh yes, he got his name wrong,
He said they'd played a game wrong
Because some kids apparently had cheated in some game.

And no-one reeeeeaaaally cared for b-p's claim
It was not iiinnnnnn-tre-sting one bit
And so they piiiicked his arguments to shreds
What a piece of

...grit
